titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to John Haly

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

$109 66
I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the articles were furnished as stated, and were necessary for the public service.

I. R. Hutchinson
Acting Surgeon Quarter Master Gen. of Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 22 of March, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General of the State of Kentucky, the Sum of One hundred and nine dollars and Sixty six cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)
